name: Spellsy
description: This React-based Wordle clone replicates the original game's experience, offering users six attempts to guess a secret word with visual feedback on letter placement and presence.

name: Windly
description: This React web app fetches weather data from an API, showing temperature, atmospheric conditions, and other variables for various locations in a clear and user-friendly interface.

name: Lisper
description: A simple Express app that fetches secrets from an external API (It may take up to 1 minute to load the page due to the hosting provider's policies, but rest assured, it will load)
